name: Those Who Died-Updated
description:
This game was for the Colors Mini Jam 62: Colors and I have since updated it! You play as a small totem trying to defeat as many ghosts as you can. To defeat a ghost, you must be holding a jewel of the same color. If a ghost touches that that is a different color than yourself, you will lose your jewel or die.

Try to get a high score!

Controls are up, down, left and right or wasd keys to move and space or enter to select

I am very new to game development and this is my first game that I have uploaded. I believe there are still many bugs, but hopefully it is still fun.
